title: Purse, early 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metal
Technique: knotted netting
dimensions: H x W: 10.2 x 5.1 cm (4 x 2 in.)
description: Green silk purse with gilt beads at intersections of mesh. Gilt metal ring to slide and close. Top fitted with bars , with filigree gold pendant.

Purse, early 19th century.
early 19th century. Medium: silk, metal
Technique: knotted netting. Gift of Mrs. Albert Blum. 1953-106-5.
